Articles.Content:
Hello, everybody! I'm Tedmeister, and I've been playing KSP for about a year, now.

I look forward to meeting all of you, as well as share a few stories!
hi there tedmeister! a warm welcome to the forums from me, zodiak!

Greetings an welcome tedmiester.

If you've been lurking for a year there's probably nothing new I can tell you. I lurked for several months. Pay it forward, and good luck!
